abstract: Atlanta Hawks general manager Danny Ferry, who is on indefinite leave for making insensitive remark about player's African heritage, has been busy working on himself, taking advice from ministers, professors and community leaders; much of team's success is credited to Ferry, who signed, acquired or drafted nearly every player on the roster.
lead_paragraph: Danny Ferry, the general manager of the Atlanta Hawks, has been on indefinite leave since September after making an insensitive remark about a player’s African heritage.

headline.main: An Architect of Hawks’ Success, in Purgatory as Playoffs Begin
headline.print_headline: An Architect of the Hawks’ Success, in Purgatory as the Playoffs Begin
